item.title: Communications Systems (HF) – One Inoperative – Single HF in Authorized Areas of Operation Ops Specs B45 HF Radios (SATCOM NOT INSTALLED)

remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided communications can be maintained with ATC and company.

note.para: Flight Control may provide alternative routes within these areas with less than two HF radios provided adequate VHF coverage is available for ATC and/or company.

numlitem.para: For International Operations, the Captain will contact Flight Control to determine ATC and company VHF/HF communication requirements.
The Dispatcher and Captain will refer to OPS Spec B45/B50.

note.para: Reference FOM Communications chapter for additional information.
